text: Vegans are such hypocrites.  If you know anything about growing crops, then you know that millions of critters are killed each time a field is plowed: beetles, worms, snakes, mice, etc.  Millions more are killed by pesticides, even the less effective organic ones.  And if the farmer wants a decent crop yield, he better be prepared to take out all the furry critters that want to eat his crops, including deer, elk, rabbits, birds, squirrels, etc.
